Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to the most common questions

How long does a security audit take?

It depends on the scope, but a standard audit takes 2-4 weeks. We give you a precise estimate after the initial consultation.

Do you work with companies of all sizes?

Yes, from startups to large corporations. We adapt our methodology and pricing to each client's size and needs.

Do you offer emergency services?

Yes, we have a 24/7 response protocol for security incidents. Guaranteed response time in less than 2 hours.

What does post-implementation support include?

30 days of included support: question resolution, minor adjustments, and verification that everything works correctly.

How do you guarantee confidentiality?

NDA signed before first contact, ISO 27001 certified systems, and strict data handling policies.

Prefer a call?

Schedule a 30-minute video call to discuss your project with no commitment.
